attributes.action: Stop the government from allowing vaping in public places.
attributes.additional_details:
Vaping had not been around long enough to know the long term damage it causes. Breathing any toxins into your lungs, including pollution, is bad for your health, 

Why subject all of the public to vape fumes. If people choose to vape that's up to them. We want the choice not to breathe in vape, this shouldn't mean having to stay in your own home to avoid it. 


https://www.nhs.uk/news/cancer/vaping-damages-dna-mice-which-may-increase-cancer-risk/
attributes.background: The government want to start allow vaping in public places such as buses, restaurants, pubs, offices... They are encouraging vaping to earn more tax!  Ridiculous! I choose not to breathe in vapour, I want to keep that free choice and still be able to go out in public. Think of our children's health
